Package nzilbb.ag.serialize

Interface SchemaSerializer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ISchemaSerializer
    public interface SchemaSerializer
    Interface for serializing a Schema to streams of data.

    Serialization takes place in the following phases:

    1. Configure serializer using configure(ParameterSet,Schema)
    2. Determine which (if any) layers are required for the serialization by calling getRequiredLayers(), which returns a list of layer IDs.
    3. Serialize the schema using serializeSchema(Schema,List)
    4. Possibly display or log warnings returned by getWarnings()
    Author:
    Robert Fromont robert@fromont.net.nz

    • Method Detail

      • getDescriptor

        SerializationDescriptor getDescriptor()
        Returns the deserializer's descriptor
        Returns:
        The deserializer's descriptor

      • configure

        ParameterSet configure​(ParameterSet configuration,
                       Schema schema)
        Sets parameters for serializer as a whole. This might include database connection parameters, locations of supporting files, standard layer mappings, etc.

        When the serializer is installed, this method should be invoked with an empty parameter set, to discover what (if any) general configuration is required. If parameters are returned, and user interaction is possible, then the user may be presented with an interface for setting/confirming these parameters. This always returns th}e required parameters, whether or not they are fulfilled.

        Parameters:
        configuration - The general configuration for the serializer.
        schema - The layer schema, definining layers and the way they interrelate.
        Returns:
        A list of configuration parameters (still) must be set before getRequiredLayers() can be called. If this is an empty list, getRequiredLayers() can be called. If it's not an empty list, this method must be invoked again with the returned parameters' values set.

      • getRequiredLayers

        String[] getRequiredLayers()
                    throws SerializationParametersMissingException
        Determines which layers, if any, must be present in the graph that will be serialized.
        Returns:
        A list of IDs of layers that must be present in the graph that will be serialized.
        Throws:
        SerializationParametersMissingException - If not all required parameters have a value.

      • serializeSchema

        NamedStream[] serializeSchema​(Schema schema,
                              List<String> layerIds)
                       throws SerializerNotConfiguredException,
                              SerializationException
        Serializes the given schema, generating one or more NamedStreams.

        Many data formats will only yield one stream (e.g. EMU-SDMS requires one JSON stream), however there may be formats that use multiple files for the same schema, which is why this method returns a list.

        Parameters:
        schema - The schema to serialize.
        layerIds - A list of IDs of layers to include in the serialization, or null for all layers.
        Returns:
        A list of named streams that contain the serialization in the given format.
        Throws:
        SerializerNotConfiguredException - if the object has not been configured.
        SerializationException - if errors occur during deserialization.

      • getWarnings

        String[] getWarnings()
        Returns any warnings that may have arisen during the last execution of serializeSchema(Schema,List).
        Returns:
        A possibly empty list of warnings.
